list.name: HTML 5
list.description: I have an extensive experience developping with HTML. This goes as far back as highschool!

list.name: JavaScript
list.description: Plain vanilla, jQuery, Backbone, Require ... you name it, I'll do it!

list.name: CSS 3
list.description: Even though design has always been my weakness, I have improved a lot recently in making simple but efficient UIs.

list.name: SASS
list.description: How to love CSS again? Just go for some SASS!

list.name: Django
list.description: I've learnt Django recently and used my newly built knowledge to develop Let's Go RTW!.

list.name: PHP
list.description: PHP was my first focus when I discovered web development back in highschool, even though I haven't used it in a while...

list.name: ASP
list.description: Never been a great fan of ASP, but hey, I can do a couple of tricks with it!

list.name: PhoneGap
list.description: I did a 6-month intership around PhoneGap, and I even attended a PhoneGap Day! I haven't been following up the new trends, but I do have some valuable experience!

list.name: Sencha Touch
list.description: I've played a little bit with it and I developed an hybrid app for the company I was working for.

list.name: Android
list.description: Probably my main focus in the mobile development area right now! I hope I'll built up some knowledge and some great apps soon!

list.name: iOS
list.description: Let's say I have the theoretical basis ... and a Mac! Mostly a Mac though ...

list.name: Java
list.description: I did some Java while in college, but I haven't used it that much after graduation.

list.name: C
list.description: I did some C while in college, but I haven't used it that much after graduation.

list.name: C++
list.description: I did some C++ while in college, but I haven't used it that much after graduation.

list.name: Python
list.description: I've started to learn Python (thanks to Django) and I hope I'll learn some new tricks soon!

list.name: C#
list.description: I did some C# while in college, but probably way too little ...

list.name: SQL Server
list.description: I have heavily used SQL Server recently, mostly for creating an API based on stored procedures.

list.name: MySQL
list.description: I studied SQL in college and I worked a couple of times with MySQL!

list.name: MongoDB
list.description: I've just started to learn MongoDB after a long interest in NoSQL databases ... and I love it!

list.name: WebSQL
list.description: Pretty useful for hybrid mobile apps!

list.name: SQLite
list.description: Django's prefered database format ... and pretty light too!

list.name: IndexedDB
list.description: The new specifications that are supposed to take over WebSQL. Let's see what happens!

list.name: Mac OS
list.description: I've been working on Mac OS for personnal projects for half a decade already!

list.name: Windows
list.description: Even if I changed my personal computer to Mac half a decade ago, I have always worked with Windows computers at work!

list.name: UNIX
list.description: I had some experiments with Debian, but I still fall for the apple!

list.name: Git
list.description: I can push, pull, commit and do a couple of fancy stuff, but I'm still far from mastering this masterpiece!

list.name: SVN
list.description: Theoretical knowledge and basic practical experience.

list.name: Mercurial
list.description: I started using Mercurial a short time ago, but I'm really eager to learn it!

list.name: French
list.description: Voulez-vous coucher avec moi ce soir ?

list.name: English
list.description: I do believe I am quite fluent in English, and my semesters abroad in California and Singapore really helped me a lot!

list.name: Spanish
list.description: Even though Spanish is my mother tongue, I actually speak better French and English than I speak Spanish! ¡Sí señor!

list.name: Japanese
list.description: おはよ！ I studied Japanese for 2 years and I went to Japan twice, but I haven't practiced a lot since then.

list.name: Chinese
list.description: 你好! 我叫安东尼奥. 我是西班牙人. That's it!

list.name: Opening up to others
list.description: I am open and take the time to listen to others. I am inquisitive and interested in new ideas.

list.name: Diplomacy
list.description: I prefer to avoid conflict. I carefully express my point of view making sure not to offend my audience.

list.name: Persuasion
list.description: I do not naturally want to impose my opinions and persuade others.

list.name: Ease in Public
list.description: I am reserved, I tend not to feel at ease in public or among people that I do not know.

list.name: Leading
list.description: Leading a team does not come naturally to me but I can accept the group's decision.

list.name: Taking Responsability
list.description: I am committed and conscientious when I am assigned a task even if I do not always seek responsibility.

list.name: Organization
list.description: I am methodical and organized but am also flexible when faced with unexpected circumstances.

list.name: Vision
list.description: I am able to focus on details and address situations objectively to be more efficient.

list.name: Autonomy
list.description: I like to develop independently even if I like sharing my achievements.

list.name: Independent Mind
list.description: I have my own opinions but am still sensitive to the criticisms of those in my company.

list.name: Creativity
list.description: I show originality but without questioning established procedures.

list.name: Self-confidence
list.description: I sometimes question myself and may tend to doubt my potential.

list.name: Stress Management
list.description: I am naturally laid back and am able to manage pressure. Stressful situations may motivate me.

list.name: Respect for Authority
list.description: I like to maintain a certain independence but I can follow the instructions of my supervisor.

list.name: Patience
list.description: I favor actions which enable me to obtain immediate results, I don't like to wait to obtain concrete results.

list.name: Responsiveness
list.description: I like to analyze situations and give myself the time to make a decision. I may sometimes lack spontaneity.

list.name: Work Ethic
list.description: I am not afraid of hard work even if I like to keep time for myself.

list.name: Competitive Spirit
list.description: I prefer to avoid situations of rivalry and favor cooperation. I do not necessarily feel the need to be the best.

list.name: Determination
list.description: I prefer to adapt my ambitions to difficulties encountered, even if it means not meeting my initial target.

list.name: Ambition
list.description: I need to progress at my own pace, my career is not a priority.
